original_text: Then Shaphan took the book to the king and reported to him: “Your officials are doing everything that has been committed to them.
korean_text: 사반이 책을 가지고 왕에게 나아가서 복명하여 이르되 왕께서 종들에게 명령하신 것을 종들이 다 준행하였나이다

sentences.original_text: Then Shaphan took the book to the king

sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 관리들이 모든 것을 하고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: that has been committed to them
